DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety GSK Biologicals ' Infanrix Hexa Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol post update follow Protocol amendment 1 ( 19-MAY-2010 ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects investigator believe parent/guardian comply requirement protocol enrol study . A male female , include , 6 12 week age time first vaccination . Born gestation period 36 42 week inclusive . Healthy subject establish medical history enter study . Written inform consent obtain parent guardian subject . Use investigational nonregistered product within 30 day precede first dose study vaccine , plan use study period . Chronic administration immunosuppressant immunemodifying drug birth first primary vaccination dose.. Administration immunoglobulins and/or blood product since birth plan administration study period . Concurrently participate another clinical study , time study period , subject expose investigational noninvestigational product . Major congenital defect serious chronic illness . Evidence previous intercurrent diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , poliomyelitis , hepatitis B and/or Hib vaccination disease . Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition , base medical history . History allergic disease reaction likely exacerbate component vaccine . The following condition temporary self limit subject may vaccinate condition resolve exclusion criterion meet : Current febrile illness axillary temperature ≥ 37.5 ºC moderate severe illness within 24 hour study vaccine administration .
